scenario_description: Maya, a marketing analyst at EcoWear—a sustainable fashion brand—wants to gauge the public reception of their latest eco-friendly clothing line on social media. She uses data visualization tools to analyze the patterns and sentiments expressed in customer feedback across various platforms. Faced with a mix of structured data from star-ratings and unstructured data from comments, Maya must determine the most effective way to visualize this data to inform the marketing strategy and communicate insights with the EcoWear team.
